scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:reset: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:reset --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:android: concurrently -n backend,frontend,android -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:android:reset: concurrently -n backend,frontend,android -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:reset --prefix frontend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
